   Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā prajñāpāramitā	PaQcaviMSati sAhasrikA prajQApAramitA
   00101 namo bhagavadyai āryaprajñāpāramitāyai//	00101 namaH Bagavat yEH Arya prajQApAramitA AyE//
   00102 nirvikalpe namas tubhyaṃ prajñāpāramite 'mite/	00102 nirvikalpe namaH tuByam prajQApAramite amite/
   00103 yā tvaṃ sarvān avadyāṅgi niravadyair nirīkṣyase//	00103 yA tvam sarvAn avadya aFgi niravadyEH nirIkzyase//
   00104 ākāśam iva nirlepāṃ niṣprapañcāṃ nirakṣarām//	00104 AkASam iva nirlepAm nizprapaQcAm nirakzarAm//
   00105 yas tvāṃ paśyati bhāvena sa paśyati tathāgatam//	00105 yaH tvAm paSyati BAvena sa paSyati taTAgatam//
   00106 tava cāryaguṇādyāyā buddhasya ca jagadguroḥ/	00106 tava ca Arya guNa AdyAyAH budDasya ca jagadguroH/
   00107 na paśyanty antaraṃ santaś candracandrikayor iva//	00107 na paSyanti antaram santaH candra candrikayoH iva//
   00108 kṛpātmakāḥ prapadya tvāṃ buddhadharmapuraḥsarām/	00108 kRpA AtmakAH prapadya tvAm budDa Darma puraHsarAm/
   00109 sukhenāyānti māhātmām atulaṃ bhaktivatsale//	00109 suKena AyAnti mAhAtmAm atulam Bakti vatsale//
   00110 sakṛd apy āśaye śuddhe yas tvāṃ vidhivad īkṣate/	00110 sakRt api ASaye SudDe yaH tvAm viDivat Ikzate/
   00111 tenāpi niyataṃ siddhiḥ prāpyate 'moghadarśane//	00111 tena api niyatam sidDiH prApyate amoGa darSane//
   00201 sarveṣām api vīrāṇāṃ parārthe niyatātmanām/	00201 sarvezAm api vIrANAm para arTe niyata AtmanAm/
   00202 poṣikā janayitrī ca mātā tvam asi vatsalā//	00202 pozikA janayitrI ca mAtA tvam asi vatsalA//
   00203 yad buddhā lokaguravaḥ putrās tava kṛpālavaḥ/	00203 yat budDAH loka guravaH putrAH tava kRpAlavaH/
   00204 tena tvam asi kalyāṇi sarvasattvapitāmahī//	00204 tena tvam asi kalyANi sarva sattva pitAmahI//
   00205 sarvapāramitābhis tvaṃ nirmalābhir anindite/	00205 sarva pAramitABiH tvam nirmalABiH anindite/
   00206 candralekheva tārābhir anuyātāsi sarvadā//	00206 candra leKA iva tArABiH anuyAtA asi sarva dA//
   00207 vineyaṃ janamāsādya tatra tatra tathāgathaiḥ/	00207 vineyam janam AsAdya tatra tatra taTAgaTEH/
   00208 bahurūpā tvam evaikā nānānāmabhir īḍyase//	00208 bahu rUpA tvam eva ekAH nAnA nAmaBiH Ixyase//
   00209 prabhāṃ prāpyeva dīptāṃśor avaśyāyodabindavaḥ/	00209 praBAm prApya iva dIptAMSoH avaSyAya uda bindavaH/
   00210 tvāṃ prāpya pralayaṃ yānti doṣā vādāś ca vādinām//	00210 tvAm prApya pralayam yAnti dozAH vAdAH ca vAdinAm//
   00211 tvam eva trāsajananī bālānāṃ bhīmadarśanā/	00211 tvam eva trAsa jananI bAlAnAm BIma darSanA/
   00212 āśvāsajananī cāsi viduṣāṃ saumyadarśanā//	00212 ASvAsa jananI ca asi viduzAm sOmya darSanA//
   00213 yasya tvayy apy abhiṣvaṅgas tvannāthasya na vidyate/	00213 yasya tvayi api aBizvaFgaH tvad nATasya na vidyate/
   00214 tasyāṃba katham anyatra rāgadveṣau bhaviṣyataḥ//	00214 tasya aMba kaTam anyatra rAga dvezO BavizyataH//
   00215 nāgacchasi kutaś cittaṃ na ca kvacana gacchasi/	00215 na AgacCasi kutas cittam na ca kvacana gacCasi/
   00216 sthāneṣv api ca sarveṣu vidvadbhir nopalabhyase//	00216 sTAnezu api ca sarvezu vidvadBiH na upalaByase//
   00217 ye tvām evaṃ na paśyanti prapadyante ca bhāvataḥ/	00217 ye tvAm evam na paSyanti prapadyante ca BAvataH/
   00218 prapadya ca vimucyante tad idaṃ mahad adbhutam//	00218 prapadya ca vimucyante tat idam mahat adButam//
   00301 tvām eva badhyate paśyann apaśyann api badhyate/	00301 tvAm eva baDyate paSyan apaSyan api baDyate/
   00302 tvām eva mucyate paśyann apaśyann api mucyate//	00302 tvAm eva mucyate paSyan apaSyan api mucyate//
   00303 aho vismayanīyāsi gambhīrāsi yaśasvinī/	00303 aho vismayanIyA asi gamBIrA asi yaSasvinI/
   00304 sudurbodhāsi māyeva dṛśyase na ca dṛśyase//	00304 su durboDA asi mAyA iva dRSyase na ca dRSyase//
   00305 buddhaiḥ prayekabuddhaiś ca śrāvakaiś ca niṣevitā/	00305 budDEH prayeka budDEH ca SrAvakEH ca nizevitA/
   00306 mārgas tvam eko mokṣasya nāsty anya iti niścayaḥ//	00306 mArgaH tvam ekaH mokzasya na asti anyaH iti niScayaH//
   00307 vyavahāraṃ puraskṛtya prajñaptyarthaṃ śarīriṇām/	00307 vyavahAram puraskRtya prajQapti arTam SarIriNAm/
   00308 kṛpayā lokanāthais tvam ucyase ca na cocyase//	00308 kRpayA lokanATEH tvam ucyase ca na ca ucyase//
   00309 śaktaḥ kas tvām iha stotuṃ nirnimittāṃ nirañjanām/	00309 SaktaH kaH tvAm iha stotum nirnimittAm niraQjanAm/
   00310 sarvavāgvisayātītā yā tvaṃ kvacid aniḥśritā//	00310 sarva vAc visaya atItA yA tvam kvacid aniHSritA//
   00311 saty evam api saṃvṛtyā vākpathair vayam īdṛśaiḥ/	00311 sati evam api saMvRtyAH vAc paTEH vayam IdRSEH/
   00312 tvām astutyām api stutvā tuṣṭūṣantaḥ sunirvṛtāaḥ/	00312 tvAm astutyAm api stutvA tuzwUzantaH su nirvRtAaH/
   00313 prajñāpāramitāṃ stutvā yan mayopacitaṃ śubham/	00313 prajQApAramitAm stutvA yat mayA upacitam SuBam/
   00314 tenās tv āśu jagat kṛtsnaṃ prajñāpāraparāyaṇam//	00314 tenAH tu ASu jagat kRtsnam prajQApAra parAyaNam//
   00401 evaṃ mayā śrutam/ ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma	00401 evam mayA Srutam/ ekasmin samaye BagavAn rAjagRhe viharati sma
   00402 gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ pañcamātrair	00402 gRDrakUwe parvate mahatA Bikzu saMGena sArDam paQca mAtrEH 
   bhikṣusahasraiḥ sarvair arhadbhiḥ	Bikzu sahasrEH sarvEH arhadBiH
   00403 kṣīṇāsravair niṣkleśair vaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ	00403 kzINa AsravEH nizkleSEH vaSIBUtEH su vimukta cittEH
   suvimuktaprajñair ājāneyai 	su vimukta prajQEH AjAneyE 
   00404 r mahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyair apahṛtabhārair	00404 r mahA nAgEH kRtakRtyEH kRta karaNIyEH apahRta BArEH 
   anuprāprasvakārthaiḥ parikṣīṇa 	anuprAprasvaka arTEH parikzINa 
   00405 bhavasaṃyojanaiḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaiḥ	00405 Bava saMyojanEH samyak AjQA su vimukta cittEH
   sarvacetovaśiparamapāramitāprāptaiḥ,	sarva cetaH vaSi parama pAramitA prAptEH,
   00406 pañcamātrair bhikṣuṇīśatair upāsakair upāsikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ sarvair	00406 paQca mAtrEH BikzuNI SatEH upAsakEH upAsikABiH ca sArDam sarvEH 
   dṛṣṭadharmair apari 	dRzwa DarmEH apari 
   00407 māṇairś ca bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ sarvair	00407 mANEH H ca boDisattva kowI niyuta Sata sahasrEH sArDam sarvEH 
   dhāraṇīpratilabdhaiḥ	DAraNI pratilabDEH
   00408 śūnyatāvihāribhir animittagocaraiḥ praṇidhānākalpitaiḥ	00408 SUnyatA vihAriBiH animitta gocarEH praNiDAna akalpitEH
   kṣāntisamatāprati 	kzAnti sama tA prati 
   00409 labdhair asaṅgadhāraṇīpratilabdhair acyutābhijñair ādeyavacanair	00409 labDEH asaFga DAraNI pratilabDEH acyuta aBijQEH Adeya vacanEH 
   akuhakair alapakair arapagata 	akuhakEH alapakEH arapa gata 
   00410 jñātralābhacittair nirāmiṣadharmadeśakair	00410 jQAtra lABa cittEH nirAmiza Darma deSakEH 
   gaṃbhīradharmakṣāntipāraṃgatair vaiśāradya 	gaMBIra Darma kzAnti pAraMgatEH vESAradya 
   00411 prāptair mārakarmasamatikrāntaiḥ karmāvaraṇapratiprasrabdhair	00411 prAptEH mAra karma samatikrAntEH karma AvaraNa pratiprasrabDEH 
   dharmapravicayavibhakti 	Darma pravicaya viBakti 
   00412 nirdeśakuśalair asaṃkhyeyakalpapraṇidhānasusamārabdhaiḥ smitamukhaiḥ	00412 nirdeSa kuSalEH asaMKyeya kalpa praNiDAna su samArabDEH smita muKEH
   pūrvālāpibhi 	pUrvAlApiBi 
   00413 r vigatabhṛkuṭīmukhair gāthābhir gītālapanakuśalair	00413 r vigata BRkuwI muKEH gATABiH gIta Alapana kuSalEH

   00414 bhānair anantaparṣadabhibhavanavaiśāradyasamanvāgair	00414 BAnEH ananta parzad aBiBavana vESAradya samanvAgEH 
   anantakalpakoṭīniḥsaraṇakuśalai 	ananta kalpa kowI niHsaraNa kuSalE 
   00415 r	00415 r

   00501 dhimuktaiḥ sattvagaticaritasūkṣmanānādhimuktyavatārakuśalair	00501 DimuktEH sattva gati carita sUkzma nAnA aDimukti avatAra kuSalEH

   sarvabuddhakṣetraānantavyūha 	sarva budDa kzetraa ananta vyUha

   00505 sthānakleśapraśamanakuśalaiḥ	00505 sTAna kleSa praSamana kuSalEH

   00511 śriyā ca vajramatinā ca ratnamudrāhastena ca nityokṣiptahastena ca	00511 SriyA ca vajramatinA ca ratnamudrA hastena ca nitya ukzipta hastena ca

   00513 śatasahasraiḥ sārdham/	00513 Sata sahasrEH sArDam/

   dharmaṃ}} deśayati/ atha tatra lokadhātau	DarmaM}} deSayati/ aTa tatra lokaDAtO
   01509 cāritramatir nāma bodhisattvaḥ {{mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ	01509 cAritramatiH nAma boDisattvaH {{ mahAsattvaH tam mahAntam avaBAsam

   tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ	tena upasaMkrAmat upasaMkramya tasya BagavataH pAdO aBivandya tam

   pūrvasyāṃ	pUrvasyAm

   kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān samādhinirhārakuśalān	kumAra BUtAn DAraNI pratilabDAn samADi nirhAra kuSalAn

   paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ	paripRcCati alpa AtaFka tAm laGu utTAna tAm yAtrAm balam suKa sparSa vihAra tAm
   ca paripṛcchati/ imāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnākareṇa tathāgatena	ca paripRcCati/ imAni ca tena BagavatA ratna AkareNa taTAgatena
   nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni}}	nAnA ratna mayAni suvarNa nirBAsAni sahasra patrANi padmAni prezitAni}}
   bhagavataḥ/	BagavataH/
   01702 atha khalu bhagavān śākyamuniḥ {{tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā}}	01702 aTa Kalu BagavAn SAkya muniH {{taTAgataH tAni padmAni gRhItvA a}}
   yena te paścimottarasyāṃ diśi {{gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas tena}}	yena te paScima uttarasyAm diSi {{gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamA lokaDAtavaH tena}}
   01703 prākṣipat/ taiś ca padmaiḥ {{te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan/ teṣu ca	01703 prAkzipat/ tEH ca padmEH {{te lokaDAtavaH sPuwAH aBUvan/ tezu ca
   padmeṣu buddhavigrahāniṣaṇakāḥ teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti	padmezu budDa vigraha AnizaNakAH tezu ca budDa kzetrezu Darmam deSayanti
   yad utemām eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām/ yaiś ca	yat uta imAm eva prajQApAramitA pratisaMyuktAm Darma deSa nAm/ yEH ca
   sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutas te niyatā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau/	sattvEH sa DarmaH SrutaH te niyatAH aBUvan anuttarAyAm samyaksamboDO/
   atha khalu te bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās	aTa Kalu te boDisattvAH te ca gRhasTAH te ca pravrajitAH te ca dArakAH 
   tāś ca dārikās tato ratnāvatyā lokadhātoḥ samantaraśminā bodhisattvena	tAH ca dArikAH tatas ratnAvatyAH lokaDAtoH samantaraSminA boDisattvena
   mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ	mahAsattvena sArDam AgatAH sva ka svakEH kuSala mUlEH Bagavantam
   śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurūkṛtya sammānya saṃpūjyaikānte}} nyaṣīdan/	SAkya munim satkRtya gurUkRtya sammAnya saMpUjya ekAnte}} nyazIdan/
   01704 atha khalv adhastād diśi {{gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya	01704 aTa Kalu aDastAt diSi {{gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn atikramya
   tebhyo yaḥ}} savāvasāniko lokadhātuḥ padmā nāma tatra	teByaH yaH}} savAvasAnikaH lokaDAtuH padmA nAma tatra
   01705 padmaśrīr nāma tathāgataḥ {{'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate	01705 padmaSrIH nAma taTAgataH {{ arhan samyaksaMbudDaH tizWati Driyate
   yāpayati/ sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ}} deśayati/	yApayati/ saH imAm eva prajQApAramitAm boDisattvAnAm DarmaM}} deSayati/
   atha tatra lokadhātau padmottaro nāma	aTa tatra lokaDAtO padmottaraH nAma
   01706 bodhisattvaḥ {{mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ ca	01706 boDisattvaH {{ mahAsattvaH tam mahAntam avaBAsam dRzwvA taQ ca
   mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavata āsecanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena	mahAntam pRTivI cAlam taQ ca BagavataH Asecanakam Atma BAvam dRzwvA yena
   bhagavān ratnākaras tathāgato 'rhan samykasaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad	BagavAn ratna AkaraH taTAgataH arhan samyka saMbudDaH tena upasaMkrAma d
   upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgataṃ ratnākaram	upasaMkramya tasya BagavataH pAdO aBivandya tam taTAgatam ratnAkaram
   etad avocat/ ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke	etat avocat/ kaH Bagavan hetuH kaH pratyayaH asya mahataH avaBAsasya loke
   prādurbhāvāya asya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya asya ca	prAdurBAvAya asya ca mahataH pRTivI cAlasya asya ca
   tathāgatasyāsecanakātmabhāvasya sandarśanāya/ evam ukte ratnākaras	taTAgatasya Asecanaka Atma BAvasya san darSana aya/ evam ukte ratna Akaras
   tathāgataḥ samantaraśmiṃ bodhisattvam etad}} avocat/ asti kulaputra ita	taTAgataH samantaraSmim boDisattvam etat }} avocat/ asti kula putraH ita
   upariṣṭād diśi {{gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya}} sahā nāma	uparizwAt diSi {{gaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAn lokaDAtUn atikramya}} sahA nAma
   01707 lokadhātuḥ {{tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhas	01707 lokaDAtuH {{tatra SAkyamuniH nAma taTAgataH arhan samyaksambudDa s
   tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati/ sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ	tizWati Driyate yApayati/ sa boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm
   prajñāpāramitāṃ samprakāśayati tasyāyām īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ/ atha khalu	prajQApAramitAm samprakASayati tasyAyAm IdRSaH anuBAvaH/ aTa Kalu
   samantaraśmir bodhisattvo ratnākaraṃ tathāgatm etad avocat/ gamisyāmy ahaṃ	samantaraSmiH boDisattvaH ratna Akaram taTAgatm etat avocat/ gamisyAmi aham
   bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya	Bagavan tAm sahAm lokaDAtum taQ ca SAkya munim taTAgatam darSanAya
   vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān bhūyas tvena	vandanAya paryupAsanAya tAn ca boDisattvAn mahAsattvAn BUyas tvena
   kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān samādhinirhārakuśalān	kumAra BUtAn DAraNI pratilabDAn samADi nirhAra kuSalAn

   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti avimuktijñānadarśanān vimuktijñānadarśanskandhe	pratizWApayizyAmi iti avimukti jQAna darSanAn vimukti jQAna darSan skanDe
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti aṭṭaṣṭasatyān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti	pratizWApayizyAmi iti awwazwa satyAn srotaApatti Pale pratizWApayizyAmi iti
   sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti pratyekabodhau	sakRdAgAmi Pale anAgAmi Pale arhat tve pratizWApayizyAmi iti pratyeka boDO
   pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti	pratizWApayizyAmi iti anuttarAyAm samyaksaMboDO pratizWApayizyAmi iti
   bodhisattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam/ ye uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi	boDisattvena prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam/ ye uttara pUrvasyAm diSi
   gaṅgādanīvālukopameṣu lokadātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā andhās te	gaFgAdanI vAlukA upamezu lokadAtuzu sarva budDa kzetrezu sattvAH anDAH te
   mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyanīti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam/	mama anuBAvena cakzuzA rUpANi drakzyani iti prajQApAramitAyAm Sikzitavyam/

   baleṣu nāma na ca nāmni balāni/ tat kasya hetoḥ/ tatha hi yac ca nāma yāni	balezu nAma na ca nAmni balAni/ tat kasya hetoH/ taTa hi yat ca nAma yAni

   nāmni bodhyaṅgāni/ tat kasya hetoḥ/ tatha hi yac ca nāma yāni ca	nAmni boDi aFgAni/ tat kasya hetoH/ taTa hi yat ca nAma yAni ca

   mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate/ tasmin	mahAsattvaH prajQApAramitAyAm caran imAn DarmAn upaparIkzate/ tasmin
   samaye śūnyatāśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na	samaye SUnyatA SUnyatAm na upEti na upAdadAti na aDitizWati na aBiniviSate na

   25514 dvaidhīkāram/ {{yo bhagavan cakṣuro 'nutpādo na tad cakṣuḥ/ yo	25514 dvEDIkAram/ {{yaH Bagavan cakzuraH anutpAdaH na tat cakzuH/ yaH 
   śrotrasya ghrāṇasya jihvāyāḥ kāyasya yo manaso 'nutpādo na tad mana iti hi	Srotrasya GrANasya jihvAyAH kAyasya yaH manasaH anutpAdaH na tat manaH iti hi

   dharmasyānutpādo na sa dharma iti hi dharmaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad	Darmasya anutpAdaH na sa DarmaH iti hi DarmaH ca anutpAdaH ca advayam etat 
   advaidhīkāram/ yo bhagavan cakṣurvijñānasyānutpādo na tad cakṣurvijñānam/	advEDIkAram/ yaH Bagavan cakzuH vijQAnasya anutpAdaH na tat cakzuH vijQAnam/

   adhyātmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na tad adhyātmaśūnyatā/ yo bahirdhāśūnyatāyā	aDyAtma SUnyatAyAH anutpAdaH na tat aDyAtma SUnyatA/ yaH bahirDA SUnyatAyA
